#summary Trakt.tv

= Introduction =

trakt helps you keep a record of what TV shows you are watching. Based on your favorites, trakt recommends additional shows you'll enjoy!


= Details =
  * [http://trakt.tv/ Trakt.tv Website]
  * To use trakt.tv an account has be created

  * Valerie will then automatically notify trakt.tv about your status.
